channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: House committee issues subpoenas for Epstein files, depositions with Clintons and other officials
item.description: The House Oversight Committee has subpoenaed the Justice Department for files in the sex trafficking investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Suspect in Tennessee quadruple killing captured after week on the run
item.description: A manhunt for the suspect in the Tennessee kidnappings and killings of four people, including three from the same family, ended Tuesday, police said.

item.title: WATCH: Two men jump into rushing water to save stranded monkey
item.description: Two men in India sprang into action when they spotted a stranded monkey in a rushing river.

item.title: 2 dead and 58 sick from growing Legionnaires' disease cluster in New York City
item.description: Two people have died and at least 58 people have been diagnosed with Legionnaires’ disease in a cluster that broke out in New York City last week.

item.title: Should a 70-year-old buy an annuity? Here's what to know now.
item.description: Thinking about buying an annuity at age 70? Here's what to consider before locking in this type of lifetime income.
